EASTERN CAROLINA REGIONAL HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
LOFTON. No. 32PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 14, 2015. Thomas E. Stroud, Raleigh, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. E. Bradley Evans, Winterville, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. John R. Keller, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Andrew Cogdell, Morganton, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Theodore O. Fillette, III, Charlotte, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Cheryl A. Marteney, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. Michael J. Parrish, New Bern, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. Peter Gilbert, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Charles Francis, for Raleigh Housing Authority. Celia Pistolis, Raleigh, for Lofton, Sherbreda. William K. Brownlee, Raleigh, for Apartment Association of North Carolina. Ruth Sheeham, for Raleigh Housing Authority. Alan D. Woodlief, Jr., Raleigh, for Raleigh Housing Authority.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of July 2015 by Apartment Association of NC for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of July 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
